title: Coins 4 Clothes
summary: We give people an incentive to do good, by rewarding them with the crypto-currency Bitcoin Cash (BCH) every time they make a clothing donation to an approved local charity. We also provide education and support to every clothing donor, teaching them how to store their coins, how to send and receive transactions, and where they can spend their Bitcoin Cash (BCH).
